definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: The post-position word is a kind of function word in the modern Kazakh language.
sentences.chinese: 後置詞是現代哈薩克語虛詞的一種。

sentences.english: Third: the role of rhetoric in ancient Chinese Function Words.
sentences.chinese: 古漢語虛詞的修辭作用。

sentences.english: Singing in the extensive use of the word form word liner.
sentences.chinese: 唱腔中大量運用襯字虛詞。

sentences.english: As function words, English connectives have been ignored by academic circle.
sentences.chinese: 英語連接詞作爲虛詞，一直爲學術界所忽視。

sentences.english: The third chapter is the usage of special function words in Jiaozhou Dialect.
sentences.chinese: 第三章研究膠州話中特殊虛詞的用法。

sentences.english: Function words, on the other hand, vary in their use and help provide reference points in conversations.
sentences.chinese: 相反，虛詞有不同的用法，幫助在對話中提供參考。

sentences.english: Being a function word, the article can't be used on its own.
sentences.chinese: 英語冠詞是一種虛詞，本身不能獨立使用。

sentences.english: Mozi has made certain contribution in studying on function word.
sentences.chinese: 墨子對虛詞的研究做出了一定的貢獻。

sentences.english: Morphology comprises notional words and function words.
sentences.chinese: 詞法部分包括實詞和虛詞。

sentences.english: The non-standard usage of function words in legislative wording is varied.
sentences.chinese: 立法語言虛詞使用不規範現象五花八門。

sentences.english: In this essay study all the function words of Yantielun is the research object.
sentences.chinese: 本論文以《鹽鐵論》的虛詞作爲研究對象。

definition: to have no other choice/to be the last resort
pinyin: bu4 de2 yi3 er2 wei2 zhi1

definition: lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
to stop halfway/to give up halfway/interruption/suspension
hard to tell if it's real or sham
